title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sisyphus, Study after Gue", 1821–22
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk
Support: white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: Tisifone/25 Guercino Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Bearded man, nude except for billowing scarf, pushes against large boulder. In distance, city wall with pyramidal gate.

tombstone.epitaph:

1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk
